mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reply INNER JOIN user ON reply.writer_id = user.id WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY reply.id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (content, entry_date, modify_date, writer_id, board_id) VALUES(#{content}, NOW(), NOW(), #{writerId}, #{boardId})
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET content = #{content}, modify_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
